data.title: SITUATION
questions: In this phase, confirm the context in which the person acted.
What was the situation or challenge the person was facing?
In what context/setting did this happen? When did it occur?

data.title: BEHAVIOR
questions: In this phase, highlight the person’s specific behavior.
What specifically did the person say and do?

data.title: RESULT
questions: In this phase, connect her/his behavior to an outcome/result.
What was the consequence? Impact? Result? Benefit?
What did their action/performance produce or yield?
(example) “As a result the customer has confidence in us.”

data.title: FEELING
questions: In this phase, share your feelings or further benefits of the accomplishment.
What did this outcome cause you to feel? Others?
What further benefit or consequence did this have?
(example) “I’m happy to say they gave us a ‘green light’.”
